byline.contributor: Stanley Reed reported from London, and Amie Tsang from Hong Kong.
byline.original: By STANLEY REED and AMIE TSANG

lead_paragraph: Markets have been rattled by slowing global demand for raw materials, with the Swiss mining and trading company Glencore a favorite target.

headline.main: Stock Sell-Off Extends to Asia, but Glencore Edges Higher

snippet: Markets have been rattled by slowing global demand for raw materials, with the Swiss mining and trading company Glencore a favorite target.

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
